regen.absent_element: error handling for failure in resolving temperature validity due to system inconsistencies or miscommunications
regen.new_specification: The THEMAS system shall detect inconsistencies or communication errors when evaluating temperature validity and shall trigger an error status indicating system diagnostics required.

label: If the current temperature value is within the valid range, the THEMAS system shall output a valid temperature status.
absence: situation of valid current temperature value
